director.name: 蒂埃里·比尼斯蒂 Thierry Binisti

introduction: Juliet is a thirty-something singleton in Paris. Here in the world’s most romantic city, the inevitable happens: she falls head over leopard-print Blahnik open-toe heels in love. But the object of her newfound desire is not her goodcatch fiancé. It’s the romantic American musician who just moved in upstairs.What follows is 2/3 Ally McBeal and 1/3 Fantastic Journey. As Juliet stumbles through the ups and downs of love, we observe the effect on her body from the inside out. Lust, infidelity, jealousy, betrayal… we reveal all the neurobiological effects of the twists and turns of love.Using endoscopic cameras, optical fibre, 3D computer-generated animation and a whole arsenal of medical scanning techniques, we observe the incredible mechanisms of the human body in response to a uniquely human phenomenon.本片以纪录片结合科技实验、模拟恋爱情境，解析当人遇上爱情时，荷尔蒙及身体构造组织产生的变化，并了解到恋爱过程的多变，让观众透过科学的显微镜下透视在每个人身上的欲望城市！利用爱情故事探索人体内部脑、心脏和荷尔蒙，纪录在陷入情网时的各种变化。片中使用内视镜相机、光学纤维、3D电脑动画和医疗扫描技术，观察到令人难以置信的机制，也运用镜头来回答人类独有的现象，传达出有关于爱情和身体之间的故事。既是爱情喜剧，也是医学纪录片的《透视爱的进行式》要透过爱情来维持心理与生理的身心健康。
